3: I didn't think you're the type to like to collect weapons like katanas.
The cracking sound when they're wielded and the metallic roar of when attacking with them are so pleasing to the ear. It's something that other types of weapons can never do.
Uh-huh. By the look on your face you should learn this feeling from experience.
Well, let's take this opportunity to trade a few blows and let me see if your strength has grown.
